title: Hong Kong Harbour View Escape With Dining Inclusions
description: Having attained over fifty awards since its opening in 2009, the five-star Harbour Grand Hong Kong provides a lavish oasis above the pulsing streets of Chinaâ€™s vibrant shopping capital. Stay waterfront in trendy North Point and immerse yourself in the vibrant culture and exciting culinary scene of Hong Kong with daily buffet breakfast, HK$300 dining credit to share and a guaranteed late 1pm checkout so you can make the most of your last day.
offer_address: 23 Oil St, North Point, Hong Kong
